title: Double-Angle, Half-Angle, and Reduction Formulas
body: For the following exercises, find the values of the six trigonometric functions if the conditions provided hold. Write your answer in the following order, the value of sin, cos, tan, csc, sec, and finally cot. With commas and no spaces. Do not input decimal answers. If you have a square root, write $$\sqrt{x}$$, where $$x$$ is the value being square rooted.
